entry.title: MATA Commission for HKNME
entry.content:
MATA has commissioned The End of Forgetting for the Hong Kong New Music Ensemble, for octet and electronics. To be premiered in April of 2020 during the MATA Festival in NYC.

https://www.hongkongnewmusic.org/
entry.summary: MATA has commissioned The End of Forgetting for the Hong Kong New Music Ensemble, for octet and electronics. To be premiered in April of 2020 during the MATA Festival in NYC.

entry.title: Mata Hknme
entry.content: The Hong Kong New Music Ensemble will give the premiere of The End of Forgetting for octet and electronics, a MATA commission, during the MATA Festival in NYC.
entry.summary: The Hong Kong New Music Ensemble will give the premiere of The End of Forgetting for octet and electronics, a MATA commission, during the MATA Festival in NYC.

entry.title: Dimenna
entry.content: In our flagship concert of our 2019-20 season, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a new work we have commissioned from Swiss composer Katharina Rosenberger.
entry.summary: In our flagship concert of our 2019-20 season, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a new work we have commissioned from Swiss composer Katharina Rosenberger.

entry.title: Eastman Ears Residency
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence for the Eastman Audio Research Studio at the Eastman School of Music.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence for the Eastman Audio Research Studio at the Eastman School of Music.

entry.title: Miami Frost School
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence for the Frost School of Music, alongside distinguished composer in residence George Lewis! We’ll be performing a concert of new works by faculty and a reading session with student composers.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence for the Frost School of Music, alongside distinguished composer in residence George Lewis! We’ll be performing a concert of new works by faculty and a reading session with student composers.

entry.title: Ticf Hknme
entry.content:
Aug. 9, 2019, Bangkok: Thailand International Composition Festival, Mahidol University, Thailand. soliloquios del viento performed by the Hong Kong New Music Ensemble.

https://www.hongkongnewmusic.org/

https://www.music.mahidol.ac.th/ticf/
entry.summary: Aug. 9, 2019, Bangkok: Thailand International Composition Festival, Mahidol University, Thailand. soliloquios del viento performed by the Hong Kong New Music Ensemble.

entry.title: Transit Interface
entry.content:
Transit Festival. Ensemble Interface performs Soliloquios del Viento (2017) alongside works by Ashley Fure, Wieland Hoban, and Maya Verlaak with electric guitarist Nico Couck.

https://www.festival2021.be/transit/agenda

http://www.ensembleinterface.com/en/
entry.summary: Transit Festival. Ensemble Interface performs Soliloquios del Viento (2017) alongside works by Ashley Fure, Wieland Hoban, and Maya Verlaak with electric guitarist Nico Couck.

entry.title: UT Austin Visting Composer
entry.content: UT Austin Butler School of Music Residency October 2019. Teaching lessons and courses for composition and electronic music students, working towards Telematic Performance collaboration between UT Austin and Mahidol University, supported by the UT Austin Global Classrooms Initiative.
entry.summary: UT Austin Butler School of Music Residency October 2019. Teaching lessons and courses for composition and electronic music students, working towards Telematic Performance collaboration between UT Austin and Mahidol University, supported by the UT Austin Global Classrooms Initiative.

entry.title: Northern Colorado Visting Composer
entry.content: Apr. 17, 2019, University of Northern Colorado: Guest Composer Lecture, lessons with composition students.
entry.summary: Apr. 17, 2019, University of Northern Colorado: Guest Composer Lecture, lessons with composition students.

entry.title: TICF Academy for Young Composers
entry.content:
Aug. 5-10, 2019, Bangkok: Thailand International Composition Festival (TICF) Academy for Young Composers, Director and Faculty Member. Ensembles-in-Residence Hong Kong New Music Ensemble, Duo Ostinato, and faculty members Nina C. Young and Tonia Ko. Reading session of new work commissioned by MATA, NYC. More at https://bit.ly/TICFapp

http://www.jasonthorpebuchanan.com/ticf.html

https://www.hongkongnewmusic.org/

https://www.music.mahidol.ac.th/ticf/
entry.summary: Aug. 5-10, 2019, Bangkok: Thailand International Composition Festival (TICF) Academy for Young Composers, Director and Faculty Member. Ensembles-in-Residence Hong Kong New Music Ensemble, Duo Ostinato, and faculty members Nina C. Young and Tonia Ko. Reading session of new work commissioned by MATA, NYC.
